field.name: IRQMAP
field.description: Interrupt Mapping, Each set bit represents the interrupt number that will be passed to interrupt controller. It is allowed to set more than one bit.

field.name: UNLOCK_KEY
field.description: Write Unlock Key, Write unlock key value to allow write to a single module register.

field.name: PLL_FAIL
field.description: PLL Generator Fail, Bit is set if external PLL generator encountered unexpected error.

field.name: XTAL_CORE_FAIL
field.description: External XTAL Oscillator Fail, Bit is set if external XTAL oscillator encountered unexpected error.

field.name: XTAL_RTC_FAIL
field.description: External 32kHz XTAL Oscillator Fail, Bit is set if external 32kHz XTAL oscillator encountered unexpected error.

field.name: IREF_CAL_EN
field.description: PMU Calibration Enable

field.name: IREF_TRIM_VAL_SRC
field.description: Select source of PMU current trimming value, '0' – Flash, '1' – configuration register

field.name: IREF_TRIM_VAL
field.description: PMU current trim value

field.name: IREF_TRIM_EN
field.description: Enable PMU current trimming

field.name: IREF_TRIM_VAL
field.description: PMU current trim value

field.name: IREF_CAL_RDY
field.description: PMU calibration ready indicatior

field.name: RC_RTC_VAL
field.description: FLL Calibration Value, , Calibration value of internal FLL 32kHz RTC RC generator.

field.name: RC_RTC_RDY
field.description: FLL Calibration Ready, Calibration value of internal FLL 32kHz RTC RC generator is ready.

field.name: CLK_RTC_SEL
field.description: 32kHz RTC Clock Source, '0' - Internal RC oscillator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator

field.name: RC_RTC_VAL_SRC
field.description: Select source of RC oscillator frequency trimming value, '0' – Flash, '1' – configuration register

field.name: RC_RTC_VAL
field.description: 32 kHz RC Osciilator Calibration Value, Calibration value of internal 32 kHz RC generator.

field.name: RC_RTC_CAL
field.description: FLL Calibration Enable, Enable calibration of internal FLL 32kHz RTC RC generator.

field.name: XTAL_RTC_SEL
field.description: Select External XTAL as RTC Clock Source, Informative only to generate interrupt on XTAL fail., '0' - Internal RC oscillator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator

field.name: XTAL_RTC_TEST
field.description: External XTAL Fail Test Input, Set this bit to simulate XTAL fail.

field.name: TEST_OUT_EN
field.description: Clock Test Output Enable

field.name: RC_CORE_VAL_SRC
field.description: Select source of RC oscillator frequency trimming value, '0' – Flash, '1' – configuration register

field.name: RC_CORE_VAL
field.description: 16 MHz RC Osciilator Calibration Value, Calibration value of internal 16MHz RC generator.

field.name: RC_CORE_CAL
field.description: FLL Calibration Enable, Enable calibration of internal FLL 16MHz RC generator.

field.name: CORE_SEL
field.description: Clock Source Selection, '0' - Internal 16MHz RC generator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator, '2' - PLL generator, '3' - RTC 32kHz clock source

field.name: XTAL_CORE_TEST
field.description: External XTAL Fail Test Input, Set this bit to simulate XTAL fail.

field.name: PLL_VFB_EN
field.description: Enable VFB Output

field.name: TEST
field.description: External PLL Fail Test Input, Set this bit to simulate PLL fail.

field.name: N
field.description: PLL Multiplication Factor, The PLL output frequency equals to:.

field.name: M
field.description: PLL Input Prescaler

field.name: REF_SEL
field.description: PLL Reference Clock Source., '0' - Internal 16MHz RC generator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator

field.name: EN
field.description: Enable PLL Loop

field.name: RC_CORE_VAL
field.description: 16 MHz RC Osciilator Calibration Value, Calibration value of internal 16MHz RC generator.

field.name: RC_CORE_RDY
field.description: 16 MHz RC Osciilator Calibration Ready, Calibration value of internal 16MHz RC generator is ready.

field.name: PLL_LOCK
field.description: State of PLL Lock Indicator

field.name: XTAL_CORE_LOCK
field.description: State of XTAL Lock Indicator

field.name: CLK_CORE_SEL
field.description: Actual Clock Source Selection, In case of error may be different than set in Clock Source Selection Register., '0' - Internal 16MHz RC generator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator, '2' - PLL generator, '3' - RTC 32kHz clock source

field.name: GNSS_EXT_ADC
field.description: Config External ADC Input

field.name: GNSS_OUT_BAND
field.description: Config ADC Test Output Band., '0' - L1 band, '1' - L5 band

field.name: IREF_COMP
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM current reference comparator output

field.name: VREF_COMP
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM voltage reference comparator output

field.name: PWR_UP
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM power up indicator, '0' – power down, '1' – power up

field.name: CAL_EN
field.description: Enable PM calibration mode

field.name: TEST_EN
field.description: Enable PM test mode

field.name: LDO_ADC_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM Intermediate Frequency Analog to Digital Converter (IF-ADC) LDO

field.name: LDO_IF_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM Intermediate Frequency (IF) LDO

field.name: LDO_DPLL_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM Phase Locked Loop (PLL) digital LDO

field.name: LDO_APLL_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM Phase Locked Loop (PLL) analog LDO

field.name: LDO_RF_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM radio-frequency (RF) LDO

field.name: VREF_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM voltage reference buffer

field.name: IREF_TRIM_SRC
field.description: Select source of GNSS-AFE PM current reference trimming value, '0' – Flash, '1' – configuration register

field.name: IREF_TRIM
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM current reference trimming

field.name: IREF_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM current reference

field.name: BGVR_TRIM_SRC
field.description: Select source of GNSS-AFE PM bangap voltage reference trimming value, '0' – Flash, '1' – configuration register

field.name: BGVR_TRIM
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM bangap voltage reference trimming

field.name: BGVR_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM bangap voltage reference

field.name: NRST
field.description: GNSS-AFE reset signal, '0' – GNSSAFE in reset state

field.name: CAL_RDY_L5
field.description: LNA15 L5 calibration ready indicator, '1' – calibration finished, '0' - calibration in progress

field.name: CAL_RDY_L1
field.description: LNA15 L1 calibration ready indicator, '1' – calibration finished, '0' - calibration in progress

field.name: L5
field.description: LNA15 L5 frequency tuning word

field.name: L1
field.description: LNA15 L1 frequency tuning word

field.name: L5_TUNE_SRC
field.description: Select source of LNA15 L5 frequency tuning value, '0' – Flash, '1' – configuration register

field.name: L1_TUNE_SRC
field.description: Select source of LNA15 L1 frequency tuning value, '0' – Flash, '1' – configuration register

field.name: CAL_WORD_L5
field.description: LNA15 L5 calibration word

field.name: CAL_WORD_L1
field.description: LNA15 L1 calibration word

field.name: CAL_EN_L5
field.description: LNA15 L5 calibration enable

field.name: CAL_EN_L1
field.description: LNA15 L1 calibration enable

field.name: EN_L5
field.description: LNA15 Enable L5 branch

field.name: EN_L1
field.description: LNA15 Enable L1 branch

field.name: EN
field.description: LNA15 Enable

field.name: L5
field.description: LNA15 L5 frequency tuning word

field.name: L1
field.description: LNA15 L1 frequency tuning word

field.name: BALUN_TUNE_SRC
field.description: Select source of BALUN1 frequency tuning value, '0' – Flash, '1' – configuration register

field.name: BALUN_TUNE
field.description: BALUN1 center frequency tuning

field.name: BALUN_EN
field.description: BALUN1 Enable

field.name: MIXER_EN
field.description: MIXER1 Enable

field.name: BALUN_TUNE_SRC
field.description: Select source of BALUN1 frequency tuning value, '0' – Flash, '1' – configuration register

field.name: BALUN_TUNE
field.description: BALUN5 center frequency tuning

field.name: BALUN_EN
field.description: BALUN5 Enable

field.name: MIXER_EN
field.description: MIXER5 Enable

register.name: PROBE_CONF
register.description: GNSS-AFE IF1 analog probing Configuration Register

field.name: PLL15FB_SEL
field.description: Select FB from PLL1 or PLL5, '0' - PLL1, '1' - PLL5

field.name: PLL15FB_EN
field.description: Enable FB from PLL1 or PLL5

field.name: IF5_PROBEB_SELECT
field.description: IF5 PROBE B Select

field.name: IF5_PROBEB_ENABLE
field.description: IF5 PROBE B Enable

field.name: IF5_PROBEA_SELECT
field.description: IF5 PROBE A Select

field.name: IF1_PROBEB_SELECT
field.description: IF1 PROBE B Select

field.name: IF1_PROBEB_ENABLE
field.description: IF1 PROBE B Enable

field.name: IF1_PROBEA_SELECT
field.description: IF1 PROBE A Select

field.name: LOPCB_EN
field.description: PLL1 allow extarnal LO signal, '1' - PLL1 external LO enabled, '0' PLL1 external LO disabled

field.name: TEST_EN
field.description: PLL1 test mode, '1' - enable Ip and Qp test

field.name: FCW
field.description: PLL1 Frequency Control Word

field.name: EN
field.description: PLL1 Enable

field.name: GAIN
field.description: PLL1 TDC scale gain used to control TDC scale calibration circuit bandwidth

field.name: SCALE
field.description: PLL1 TDC scale value used when LOAD = '1'

field.name: LOAD
field.description: PLL1 TDC scale load, '1' - load SCALE, '0' - use internal TDC scale

field.name: AMP
field.description: PLL1 DCO amplitude control

field.name: AMP_LOAD
field.description: PLL1 DCO amplitude control signal load, '1' - load AMP, '0' - use internal AMP

field.name: CTRL_PVT
field.description: PLL1 DCO coarse frequency control

field.name: CTRL_FINE
field.description: PLL1 DCO fine frequency control

field.name: CTRL_LOAD
field.description: PLL1 DCO control signal load, '1' - load CTRL_PVT and CTRL_FINE, '0' - use internal CTRL

field.name: PHERR
field.description: PLL1 phase error signal

field.name: NDIV
field.description: PLL1 divider division factor

field.name: PHSEL
field.description: PLL1 phase select signal

field.name: LOCK
field.description: PLL1 lock signal, '1' - PLL1 locked, '0' - PLL1 not locked

field.name: SCALE
field.description: PLL1 TDC scale signal

field.name: AMP
field.description: PLL1 DCO coarse frequency control

field.name: AMP_LOW
field.description: PLL1 DCO amplitude status, '1' – amplitude low

field.name: CTRL_PVT
field.description: PLL1 DCO coarse frequency control

field.name: CTRL_FINE
field.description: PLL1 DCO fine frequency control

field.name: AGC_IQ_SEP
field.description: IF1 AGC control, '0' - in-phase and quadrature controlled together, '1' - in-phase and quadrature controlled separatelly

field.name: AGC_THR
field.description: IF1 AGC threshold control

field.name: LPF_CAL
field.description: IF1 LPF calibration input

field.name: LPF_GAIN
field.description: IF1 LPF gain control, '00' - gain = 12 dB, '01' - gain = 18 dB, '10' - gain = 24 dB, '11' - gain = 24 dB

field.name: LPF_BAND
field.description: IF1 LPF band control, '00' - bandwidth = 4 MHz, '01' - bandwidth = 8 MHz, '10' - bandwidth = 16 MHz, '11' - bandwidth = 32 MHz

field.name: LPF_EN
field.description: IF1 LPF enable

field.name: PGA2_GAIN
field.description: IF1 PGA2 gain control, '00' - gain = 6 dB, '01' - gain = 12 dB, '10' - gain = 18 dB, '11' - gain = 24 dB

field.name: PGA2_EN
field.description: IF1 PGA2 enable

field.name: PGA1_1DB_GAIN_Q
field.description: IF1 quadrature PGA1 1 dB gain control, gain = PGA1_1DB_GAIN_Q*1 dB

field.name: PGA1_1DB_GAIN_I
field.description: IF1 in-phase PGA1 1 dB gain control, gain = PGA1_1DB_GAIN_I*1 dB

field.name: PGA1_GAIN
field.description: IF1 PGA1 gain control, '00' - gain = 6 dB, '01' - gain = 12 dB, '10' - gain = 18 dB, '11' - gain = 24 dB

field.name: PGA1_EN
field.description: IF1 PGA1 enable

field.name: PREAMP_EN
field.description: IF1 PREAMP enable

field.name: LOAD_EN
field.description: IF1 load external gain settings, '0' - gain controlled by AGC, '0' - gain controlled by digital inputs

field.name: EN
field.description: IF1 enable

field.name: AGC_CTRL_Q
field.description: IF1 automatic gain control (AGC) gain output for quadrature front-end, '[2:0]' – pga1_gain_1dB, '[4:3]' – pga1_gain, '[6:5]' - pga2_gain, '[8:7]' - lpf_gain

field.name: AGC_CTRL_I
field.description: IF1 automatic gain control (AGC) gain output for in-phase front-end, '[2:0]' – pga1_gain_1dB, '[4:3]' – pga1_gain, '[6:5]' - pga2_gain, '[8:7]' - lpf_gain

field.name: CLK_SEL
field.description: IF1 clock source selection, '00' – PLL1 output clock (PLL1 output frequency divided by 24), '01' – PLL5 output clock (PLL5 output frequency divided by 18), '10' – XTAL, '11 – XTAL

field.name: CLK_CONF
field.description: IF1 clock frequency control, IF1_FREQ = CLK_SRC ? PLL1_OUT_FREQ/24/POWER(2,CLK_CONF) : PLL5_OUT_FREQ/18/POWER(2,CLK_CONF)

field.name: SAH_EN
field.description: ADC1 Sample and Hold enable

field.name: ADC_EN
field.description: ADC1 enable

field.name: LOPCB_EN
field.description: PLL5 allow extarnal LO signal, '1' - PLL5 external LO enabled, '0' PLL5 external LO disabled

field.name: TEST_EN
field.description: PLL5 test mode, '1' - enable Ip and Qp test

field.name: FCW
field.description: PLL5 Frequency Control Word

field.name: EN
field.description: PLL5 Enable

field.name: GAIN
field.description: PLL5 TDC scale gain used to control TDC scale calibration circuit bandwidth

field.name: SCALE
field.description: PLL5 TDC scale value used when LOAD = '1'

field.name: LOAD
field.description: PLL5 TDC scale load, '1' - load SCALE, '0' - use internal TDC scale

field.name: AMP
field.description: PLL5 DCO amplitude control

field.name: AMP_LOAD
field.description: PLL5 DCO amplitude control signal load, '1' - load AMP, '0' - use internal AMP

field.name: CTRL_PVT
field.description: PLL5 DCO coarse frequency control

field.name: CTRL_FINE
field.description: PLL5 DCO fine frequency control

field.name: CTRL_LOAD
field.description: PLL5 DCO control signal load, '1' - load CTRL_PVT and CTRL_FINE, '0' - use internal CTRL

field.name: PHERR
field.description: PLL5 phase error signal

field.name: NDIV
field.description: PLL5 divider division factor

field.name: PHSEL
field.description: PLL5 phase select signal

field.name: LOCK
field.description: PLL5 lock signal, '1' - PLL5 locked, '0' - PLL5 not locked

field.name: SCALE
field.description: PLL5 TDC scale signal

field.name: AMP
field.description: PLL5 DCO coarse frequency control

field.name: AMP_LOW
field.description: PLL5 DCO amplitude status, '1' – amplitude low

field.name: CTRL_PVT
field.description: PLL5 DCO coarse frequency control

field.name: CTRL_FINE
field.description: PLL5 DCO fine frequency control

field.name: AGC_IQ_SEP
field.description: IF5 AGC control, '0' - in-phase and quadrature controlled together, '1' - in-phase and quadrature controlled separatelly

field.name: AGC_THR
field.description: IF5 AGC threshold control

field.name: LPF_CAL
field.description: IF5 LPF calibration input

field.name: LPF_GAIN
field.description: IF5 LPF gain control, '00' - gain = 12 dB, '01' - gain = 18 dB, '10' - gain = 24 dB, '11' - gain = 24 dB

field.name: LPF_BAND
field.description: IF5 LPF band control, '00' - bandwidth = 4 MHz, '01' - bandwidth = 8 MHz, '10' - bandwidth = 16 MHz, '11' - bandwidth = 32 MHz

field.name: LPF_EN
field.description: IF5 LPF enable

field.name: PGA2_GAIN
field.description: IF5 PGA2 gain control, '00' - gain = 6 dB, '01' - gain = 12 dB, '10' - gain = 18 dB, '11' - gain = 24 dB

field.name: PGA2_EN
field.description: IF5 PGA2 enable

field.name: PGA1_1DB_GAIN_Q
field.description: IF5 quadrature PGA1 1 dB gain control, gain = PGA1_1DB_GAIN_Q*1 dB

field.name: PGA1_1DB_GAIN_I
field.description: IF5 in-phase PGA1 1 dB gain control, gain = PGA1_1DB_GAIN_I*1 dB

field.name: PGA1_GAIN
field.description: IF5 PGA1 gain control, '00' - gain = 6 dB, '01' - gain = 12 dB, '10' - gain = 18 dB, '11' - gain = 24 dB

field.name: PGA1_EN
field.description: IF5 PGA1 enable

field.name: PREAMP_EN
field.description: IF5 PREAMP enable

field.name: LOAD_EN
field.description: IF5 load external gain settings, '0' - gain controlled by AGC, '0' - gain controlled by digital inputs

field.name: EN
field.description: IF5 enable

field.name: AGC_CTRL_Q
field.description: IF5 automatic gain control (AGC) gain output for quadrature front-end, '[2:0]' – pga1_gain_1dB, '[4:3]' – pga1_gain, '[6:5]' - pga2_gain, '[8:7]' - lpf_gain

field.name: AGC_CTRL_I
field.description: IF5 automatic gain control (AGC) gain output for in-phase front-end, '[2:0]' – pga1_gain_1dB, '[4:3]' – pga1_gain, '[6:5]' - pga2_gain, '[8:7]' - lpf_gain

field.name: CLK_SEL
field.description: IF1 clock source selection, '00' – PLL1 output clock (PLL1 output frequency divided by 24), '01' – PLL5 output clock (PLL5 output frequency divided by 18), '10' – XTAL, '11 – XTAL

field.name: CLK_CONF
field.description: IF5 clock frequency control, IF5_FREQ = CLK_SRC ? PLL1_OUT_FREQ/24/POWER(2,CLK_CONF) : PLL5_OUT_FREQ/18/POWER(2,CLK_CONF)

field.description: ADC5 Sample and Hold enable
